name: The Long Road Back
description:
The world around you has been plunged into an endless nightmare - now everything around you is hostile, and your death may be just around the corner, your only chance of survival is to shoot your way out, but with next to no ammunition, the task seems impossible...unless you make every shot count...

The Long Road Back is a brand new throwback shooter, which combines frantic and hardcore combat, with classic survival horror elements, ammo is limited, enemies are relentless, and mistakes will cost you dearly, can you survive The Long Road Back?

Game Features:

- Fight your way through hordes of monsters across 11 terrifying levels

- Intense horrific encounters throughout

- Nightmare mode for those who dare for an extreme challenge

- Up to 8 weapons to unleash upon the horror's bent on ending your life

- Maps filled with secrets rewarding brave exploration into the unknown...
